column1: please visit www. perkinsparker. com and the funeral home facebook page. the family requests that in lieu of flowers, memorial gifts would be appreciated to ronald mc. donald house charities, 16 south winooski ave., burlington vt 05401 (www. rmhcvt. org) or to the salvation army of greater burlington, 64 main street, burlington vt 05401. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 perkins-parker funeral home funeral home website by batesville, inc. site manager: login
